Tactics for stalking include repeated phone calls or hang - up calls , following victims , using GPS or investigators to track victims , watching hidden cameras , showing up without warning at home , work or school , sending emails , using chat rooms or instant messaging , sending cards , letters and packages , monitoring phone calls or computer use , contacting friends , family and neighbors to find out about victims , going through the garbage of victims , threatening victims or their families , friends and pets , and damaging property of victims such as their homes and cars .
